name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Backend Engineer with 13+ years of experience delivering high-performance applications, specializing in **Python**, **Django**, **AWS**, **Google Cloud Platform**, **PostgreSQL**, **Docker**, and **Kubernetes**. Extensive knowledge in building scalable backend solutions using **REST**ful APIs, as well as deploying and managing cloud-native systems with infrastructure as code through **Terraform**.
Proficient in **Git** and **GitHub** for version control, emphasizing collaboration in **Agile** and **Kanban** workflows. Demonstrated strength in integrating reliable database solutions and microservices architectures, while implementing CI/CD practices to streamline development and deployment processes.
Additionally, experienced in frontend technologies including **JavaScript**, **HTML**, and **CSS**, providing a well-rounded approach to application development. Adept at aligning solutions with compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.
